item.title: Installing OpenTelemetry Collector Contrib
item.description: Confirm the Collector is running The collector should now be running. We will verify this as root using systemctl command. To exit the status just press q. ​ Command Status Output sudo systemctl status otelcol-contrib ‚óè otelcol-contrib.service - OpenTelemetry Collector Contrib Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/otelcol-contrib.service; enabled; vendor preset: enabled) Active: active (running) since Tue 2023-05-16 08:23:23 UTC; 25s ago Main PID: 1415 (otelcol-contrib) Tasks: 5 (limit: 1141) Memory: 22.2M CPU: 125ms CGroup: /system.
